name: Natural Process
description: The first full-length LP from New Century Classics, Natural Process will be released December 1st, 2009 by the label FDM Recordings. Natural Process is being released under a "pay what you want" scheme, in which you can pay as much or as little as you want (the symbolic $0.01, because BC won't let us charge nothing), and just add shipping. All of the money goes directly to us, New Century Classics, so that we can keep making pretty music for you. A note on shipping: The "Everywhere else" price applies only to the European Union (excluding Poland). For everywhere else, please e-mail us at newcenturyclassics at gmail dot com to arrange pricing.

name: Heart with Four Rooms
description: The Heart with Four Rooms EP was self-released by New Century Classics on March 15th, 2009, on what was supposed to be their full-length album release show. Due to complications with their label, the full-length album would not be ready for their already booked album release tour, so the band decided to compose and self-record three completely new songs for an EP in three weeks. The songs, titled “Room One,” “Room Two,” “Room Three,” and “Room Four,” include one remix by the band Zerova. Listen and download individual tracks here: Heart with Four Rooms on Bandcamp. A note on shipping: The "Everywhere else" price applies only to the European Union (excluding Poland). For everywhere else, please e-mail us at newcenturyclassics at gmail dot com to arrange pricing.

name: New Century Classics EP
description: The first release by the band. Self released (and hand-made, literally) by the members of New Century Classics on April 1, 2007. Physical copies of this album are long gone, but the tracks can be downloaded here: New Century Classics EP on Bandcamp.
